subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After sitting idle since losing to the Chicago White Sox in a one-game playoff for the American League Central title, the Minnesota Twins agreed to terms with the free-agent third baseman Joe Crede on a one-year deal Saturday.
snippet: After sitting idle since losing to the Chicago White Sox in a one-game playoff for the American League Central title, the Minnesota Twins agreed to terms with the free-agent third baseman Joe Crede on a one-year deal Saturday.
